attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Empire is dead, it is time we recognise that the UK has little or no power in the world.  Stop criticising other governments, get our own house in order before we complain about the activities of other governments.  We have no right to judge, lest we be judged and found seriously wanting.  And most of all do not start any more wars.
